channel.title: Lag spikes when shooting enemies
channel.description:
The game runs great all maxed but sometimes when I go to shoot an enemy the game will lag for a split second. Doesn't happen all the time but it is often.
Doesn't happen when using crowbar or pistol but if I use .357, SMG or Shotgun it does. Not sure what's causing it.
